content: the 40 sts you have still on the needles continue for both sizes heel flap ws sl yf k2 sl yf sl yf 7 9 times k2 sl yf turn rs k1 p2 k2 p2 7 9 times k1 turn work theses 2 row 16 18 times i e 32 36 row total ©caoua coffee 2017 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved florestan v 1 page 3/6 florestan socks - by caoua coffee turn heel ws sl yf p18 22 p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb k7 7 ssk k1 turn ws sl yf purl to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb knit to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat the last 2 row until all sts have been worked don t turn after the last rs row now 20 24 heel sts remain gusset setup pick up and knit 17 19 sts along side of heel flap pick up one more st between flap and instep and knit this one continue by knitting the 38 42 held instep sts as follows smaller size only k1 p2 k4 p2 k2 p2 twice k4 p2 k2 p2 twice k4 p2 k1 larger size only work row 12 of instep chart continue for both sizes pick up 1 st at the bottom of the heel flap and knit it pick up 17 19 more sts along side of heel flap and knit them knit the next 36 44 sts which brings you to 2 0 sts before the instep this is the new beginning of the round smaller size only slip the next 2 sts over onto the instep needles and do the same with the first 2 sole sts on the other side of the instep continue for both sizes now you have 42 sts on your instep needle s and 52 64 sts on your sole needle s count them now to make sure you got it right gusset decreases round 1 work row 1 row 13 of instep chart sole ssk knit to 2 sts before end of sole k2tog round 2 work instep in pattern as established i e continue by working row 2 row 14 of instep chart then knit across all sole sts round 3 continue to work instep in pattern as established i e work the next instep row sole ssk knit to 2 sts before end of sole k2tog round 4 work instep in pattern as established knit across all sole sts repeat rounds 3 and 4 nine eleven more times i e 22 26 gusset rounds all together decreasing 2 sts every other round now there are 42 instep sts and 30 38 sole sts ©caoua coffee 2017 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved florestan v 1 page 4/6 florestan socks - by caoua coffee instep chart always work the repeat marked by the red delimiters twice per instep row foot continue instep in pattern as established while always
